source: Президент России Владимир Путин подписал закон о введении административной ответственности за нарушение срока и порядка оплаты товаров (работ, услуг) при осуществлении закупок для государственных и муниципальных нужд.
translation: President of Russia Vladimir Putin has signed a law introducing administrative liability for violation of the terms and procedure for paying for goods (works, services) when carrying out purchases for state and municipal needs.
reference: Russian President Vladimir Putin has signed a law on the establishment of administrative liability for violating the deadline and procedures for payment of goods (works, services) as part of procurement for state and municipal needs.

source: Этот закон призван решить весьма острую проблему неисполнения своих обязательств заказчиками при осуществлении государственных и муниципальных закупок.
translation: This law is intended to address a very acute problem of non-compliance with their obligations by customers in the implementation of state and municipal procurements.
reference: This law is meant to solve the very serious issue of customers failing to fulfill their commitments as part of state and municipal procurements.

source: Еще два года назад ситуация, когда предприниматели не могли получить оплату по уже исполненным государственным и муниципальным контрактам, была повсеместной.
translation: Two years ago, the situation where entrepreneurs were unable to receive payment for already fulfilled state and municipal contracts was widespread.
reference: Just two years ago, situations in which business owners were unable to collect payment for already-executed state and municipal contracts were widespread.

source: Тогда же президент России дал поручение Генеральной прокуратуре РФ взять проблему на особый контроль.
translation: Likewise, the President of Russia gave a order to the General Prosecutor's Office of the Russian Federation to take the problem under special control.
reference: At that time, the Russian president tasked the Office of Prosecutor General of the Russian Federation with taking the issue under special control.

source: Потому что сами бизнесмены не могли справиться с недобросовестными заказчиками, которые заключали не подкрепленные финансированием контракты, всячески пытались уклониться от взятых обязательств по оплате и включали в договоры незаконные условия.
translation: Because businessmen themselves were unable to deal with dishonest customers who entered into contracts not backed by financing, tried in every way to evade their payment obligations, and included illegal conditions in the contracts.
reference: After all, businessmen couldn’t deal on their own with dishonest customers who signed agreements without financial backing, tried their best to get out of assumed payment commitments, and included illegal conditions in agreements.

source: Проблема была системной в целом в стране.
translation: The problem was systemic throughout the country.
reference: The problem was systemic throughout the entire country.

source: С 2015 года в интересах защиты прав предпринимателей на получение оплаты по публичным заказам прокуратурой внесено 9,7 тыс. представлений, по результатам их рассмотрения к дисциплинарной ответственности привлечено 4,5 тыс. должностных лиц, к административной - 533, в следственные органы для организации процессуальных проверок представлено 75 материалов, по 46 из них возбуждены уголовные дела.
translation: Since 2015, in the interests of protecting the rights of entrepreneurs to receive payment for public contracts, the prosecutor's office has submitted 9.7 thousand representations. As a result of their consideration, 4.5 thousand officials have been brought to disciplinary responsibility, 533 to administrative responsibility, 75 materials have been submitted to investigative bodies for organizational procedural checks, and criminal cases have been initiated based on 46 of them.
reference: Since 2015, 9,700 petitions, in the interests of protecting the rights of business owners to receive payment for public contracts, were filed by the Office of the Prosecutor General: according to the results of their investigations, 4,500 officials were subject to disciplinary measures, and 533 were held administratively liable; 75 cases were submitted to the investigative authorities for procedural review, and criminal proceedings were initiated in 46 of them.

source: В итоге была погашена задолженность перед предпринимателями на сумму более 66 млрд рублей.
translation: As a result, the debt to entrepreneurs was paid off in the amount of more than 66 billion rubles.
reference: In sum, more than 66 billion rubles worth of debt owed to business owners was repaid.

source: Причем эти огромные суммы накапливались далеко не в результате неоплаты многомиллиардных контрактов.
translation: Moreover, these enormous sums did not accumulate as a result of the non-payment of multibillion-dollar contracts.
reference: Notably, these vast sums were by no means accrued as a result of non-payment of multibillion-ruble contracts.

source: К баснословным долгам привели многочисленные, систематические задержки по оплате услуг предпринимателям на куда более скромные суммы.
translation: Numerous and systematic delays in paying services to entrepreneurs have led to astronomical debts.
reference: Numerous systematic delays in payment for services to business owners for considerably more modest amounts led to these jaw-dropping debts.

source: Вот характерный случай.
translation: Here is a typical case.
reference: Here is a typical case.

source: Руководитель небольшой компании выиграл конкурс на оказание услуг по социальным перевозкам на несколько миллионов рублей.
translation: The head of a small company has won a tender for providing social transportation services worth several million rubles.
reference: The head of a small company won a tender for the provision of social transport services worth several million rubles.

source: Человек вложил все свои оборотные средства, полностью выполнил обязательства, но положенные деньги в срок не получил.
translation: The person invested all their working capital, fully fulfilled their obligations, but did not receive the money on time.
reference: The person invested all of their working capital, fully satisfied their commitments, but didn’t receive the allotted money when it was due.

source: Результат - нарастающий финансовый ком из долгов по зарплатам, налогам, кредитам, который привел бы к банкротству, если бы предприниматель не обратился за помощью в прокуратуру.
translation: The result is a growing financial bubble of salary debts, taxes, and credits, which would lead to bankruptcy if the entrepreneur had not turned to the prosecutor's office for help.
reference: The result is an escalating financial snowball comprised of payroll, tax, and loan liabilities, which would have led to bankruptcy if the business owner hadn’t approached the prosecutor’s office for assistance.

source: Сейчас в ряде регионов проблему удалось максимально нивелировать.
translation: Currently, the problem has been managed to maximally level out in a number of regions.
reference: Now, in a number of regions, they have managed to mitigate the problem to the greatest extent possible.

source: Тем не менее по состоянию на первое полугодие 2017 года совокупный объем долга по государственным и муниципальным контрактам, выявленный прокурорами субъектов Российской Федерации, составил около 27,4 млрд рублей.
translation: Nevertheless, as of the first half of 2017, the total volume of debt on state and municipal contracts, revealed by prosecutors of the subjects of the Russian Federation, amounted to approximately 27.4 billion rubles.
reference: Nevertheless, as of the first half of 2017, the total amount of debt related to state and municipal contracts, identified by the prosecutors of the constituent entities of the Russian Federation, amounted to approximately 27.4 billion rubles.

source: В регионах, где показатели задолженности продолжают достигать критических значений, прокуратура работает в режиме ручного антикризисного управления.
translation: In regions where indicators of debt continue to reach critical values, the prosecutor's office is operating in manual anti-crisis management mode.
reference: In the regions where debt indicators continue to climb to critical levels, the prosecutor’s office has adopted a hands-on approach to crisis management.

source: Генеральный прокурор лично проводит выездные совещания с представителями местной власти, на которых предметно разбираются все вскрытые прокурорами нарушения и меры по незамедлительному их устранению.
translation: The Prosecutor General personally conducts on-site meetings with representatives of local authorities, during which prosecutors' discovered violations are specifically examined and measures for their immediate elimination are discussed.
reference: The prosecutor general is personally holding on-site meetings with local officials, during which they substantively examine all of the violations uncovered by the prosecutors and the measures aimed at their immediate rectification.

source: Такие оперативные совещания в этом году уже прошли в Ярославле и Екатеринбурге.
translation: Such operational meetings have already taken place in Yaroslavl and Ekaterinburg this year.
reference: This year, these types of briefing sessions have already taken place in Yaroslavl and Yekaterinburg.

source: Качественно улучшить платежную дисциплину публичных заказчиков сможет реализация Федерального закона No 189-ФЗ "О внесении изменений в Кодекс Российской Федерации об административных правонарушениях в части установления административной ответственности должностных лиц заказчика за нарушение срока и порядка оплаты товаров (работ, услуг) при осуществлении закупок для обеспечения государственных и муниципальных нужд", который на прошлой неделе подписал президент России.
translation: The payment discipline of public customers can be significantly improved through the implementation of Federal Law No. 189-FZ "On Amendments to the Russian Federation Code of Administrative Offenses in Part Establishing Administrative Liability of the Customer's Officials for Violation of the Terms and Procedure for Payment for Goods (Works, Services) during Procurement for State and Municipal Needs," which was signed by the President of Russia last week.
reference: The realization of Federal Law No. 189-FZ “On amending the Code of the Russian Federation on Administrative Offences in terms of establishing administrative liability for officials of a customer for violating the deadline and procedures for payment of goods (works, services) as part of procurement for state and municipal needs”, which was signed by the Russian president last week, will qualitatively improve the payment discipline of public sector customers.

source: Проект закона был разработан Минэкономразвития России по инициативе Генпрокуратуры.
translation: The draft law was developed by the Ministry of Economic Development of Russia upon the initiative of the Prosecutor General's Office.
reference: The Ministry of Economic Development and Trade of the Russian Federation developed the bill at the request of the Office of the Prosecutor General.

source: Новый закон дополнит Кодекс Российской Федерации об административных правонарушениях статьей, которая предусматривает штраф от 30 тыс. до 50 тыс. рублей за нарушение должностным лицом заказчика срока и порядка оплаты товаров, работ и услуг при государственных и муниципальных закупках.
translation: The new law will supplement the Russian Federal Code of Administrative Offenses with an article that provides for a fine of 30,000 to 50,000 rubles for a violation by a customer's official of the terms and procedure for paying for goods, works, and services during state and municipal procurements.
reference: The new law will add an article to the Code of the Russian Federation on Administrative Offences, which stipulates a penalty of between 30,000 and 50,000 rubles for violation of the deadline and procedures for payment of goods, works, or services as part of state and municipal procurements by an official of a customer.

source: А если должностное лицо уже подвергалось административному наказанию за аналогичное правонарушение, то его ждет дисквалификация на срок от одного года до двух лет.
translation: And if a person in charge has already been subjected to administrative punishment for a similar offense, they are facing disqualification for a period of one to two years.
reference: However, if the official has already been subject to administrative punishment for a similar offense, then they will be suspended for a period of between one to two years.

source: Все прокуроры субъектов Российской Федерации уже получили поручение обеспечить применение этих законодательных новелл на практике.
translation: All prosecutors of the subjects of the Russian Federation have already received instructions to ensure the implementation of these legislative innovations in practice.
reference: All the prosecutors for the constituent entities of the Russian Federation have already received instructions to enforce the application of these legislative innovations in practice.

source: Группа защиты гражданских прав объявила предупреждение по передвижению в Миссури
translation:
Civil rights protection group issued a warning regarding travel in Missouri.

(Note: This is a literal translation of the given Russian text. However, to make it sound more natural in English, it could be rephrased as: "A civil rights protection group has issued a travel advisory for Missouri.")
reference: Civil rights group issues travel warning for Missouri

source: Национальная ассоциация содействия прогрессу цветного населения опубликовала предупреждение для цветных людей, путешествующих в Миссури, из-за дискриминационной политики штата и нападений на расистской почве.
translation: The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People has issued a warning to people of color traveling in Missouri due to the state's discriminatory policies and racially motivated attacks.
reference: The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People has put out an alert for people of color traveling to Missouri because of the state's discriminatory policies and racist attacks.

source: Заявление группы звучит так: «Предупреждение для путешествующих Национальной ассоциации содействия прогрессу цветного населения, действительное до 28 августа 2017 года, призывает афроамериканских путешествующих, гостей и граждан штата Миссури быть особенно внимательными и проявлять повышенную осторожность при путешествиях по штату в связи с рядом сомнительных происшествий на расистской почве, недавно имевших место по всей территории штата и приведённых здесь».
translation: The statement of the group sounds as follows: "A warning to travelers of the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People, valid until August 28, 2017, calls on African American travelers, guests, and citizens of the state of Missouri to be especially vigilant and exercise increased caution when traveling in the state due to a number of questionable incidents with a racist motive, which have recently occurred throughout the state and are listed here."
reference: "The NAACP Travel Advisory for the state of Missouri, effective through August 28th, 2017, calls for African American travelers, visitors and Missourians to pay special attention and exercise extreme caution when traveling throughout the state given the series of questionable, race-based incidents occurring statewide recently, and noted therein," the group's statement reads.

source: По словам Национальной ассоциации содействия прогрессу цветного населения, объявить предупреждение по передвижению группу побудил недавно принятый в Миссури закон, из-за которого людям стало труднее выиграть иски, связанные с дискриминацией, а также то, что правоохранительные органы штата непропорционально часто выбирают своими объектами представителей меньшинств.
translation: According to the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People, the decision to issue a travel advisory for a group was prompted by a recently enacted law in Missouri, which has made it harder for people to win discrimination-related lawsuits, as well as the fact that law enforcement agencies in the state disproportionately target minorities as their subjects.
reference: A recent Missouri law making it harder for people to win discrimination lawsuits, as well as the state's law enforcement disproportionately targeting minorities prompted the group to issue the travel alert, the NAACP said.

source: «У вас люди подвергаются нарушению прав человека.
translation: People under your care are experiencing human rights violations.
reference: "You have violations of civil rights that are happening to people.

source: Их останавливают на дорогах из-за цвета кожи, их избивают и убивают», - рассказал газете «Канзас-Сити стар» Род Чэпел, президент Национальной ассоциации содействия прогрессу цветного населения Миссури.
translation: "They are stopped on the roads because of the color of their skin, they are beaten and killed," - Rod Chapel, president of the Missouri State Branch of the NAACP, told the "Kansas City Star" newspaper.
reference: They're being pulled over because of their skin color, they're being beaten up or killed," the president of the Missouri NAACP, Rod Chapel, told The Kansas City Star.

source: «Мы слышим жалобы часто, как никогда раньше».
translation:
"We are hearing complaints frequently, more than ever before."

The Russian text uses the imperfective aspect of the verb "слышать" (to hear) and the adverb "часто" (frequently), which both indicate that the action of hearing complaints is repeated and ongoing. The phrase "как никогда раньше" (more than ever before) adds emphasis to the frequency of the complaints.
reference: We are hearing complaints at a rate we haven't heard before.

source: Это – первое предупреждение такого рода, объявленное организацией по отношению к штату США.
translation: This is the first warning of this kind ever declared by the organization with regard to the US state.
reference: It is the first such warning that the organization has issued for a state in the US.

source: Группа сослалась на такие инциденты, как унижение чернокожих студентов по расовому признаку в Университете Миссури и смерть двадцативосьмилетнего Тори Сандерса, чернокожего мужчины из Теннесси.
translation: The group referred to incidents such as the racial humiliation of black students at the University of Missouri and the death of Tori Sanders, a 28-year-old black man from Tennessee.
reference: The group cited incidents such as racial slurs against black students at the University of Missouri and the death of Tory Sanders, 28, a black man from Tennessee.

source: Сандерс погиб при подозрительных обстоятельствах ранее в этом году после того, как у него закончился бензин во время поездки по штату, и полиция штата Миссури арестовала его, не предъявив обвинения в преступлении.
translation: Sanders died under suspicious circumstances earlier this year after he ran out of gas during a trip through the state, and the Missouri state police arrested him without bringing any criminal charges.
reference: Sanders died under questionable circumstances earlier this year after he ran out of gas while traveling through the state, and was taken into custody by Missouri police without being accused of a crime.

source: В предупреждении также упоминается недавний отчёт Генеральной прокуратуры штата Миссури, согласно которому вероятность быть остановленными на дороге для чёрных водителей на 75 процентов выше, чем для белых.
translation: The warning also mentions a recent report by the Missouri State Attorney General, according to which the likelihood of black drivers being pulled over is 75 percent higher than that of white drivers.
reference: The advisory also points to a recent report by the Missouri Attorney General's Office showing that black drivers in the state were 75 percent more likely to be pulled over than whites.

source: «Цель предупреждения в том, чтобы люди были в курсе ситуации и предупредили своих родственников и друзей и коллег о том, что может случиться в Миссури», - сказал Чэпел.
translation: "The purpose of the warning is to keep people informed about the situation and to warn their relatives, friends, and colleagues about what may happen in Missouri," said Chapel.
reference: "The advisory is for people to be aware, and warn their families and friends and co-workers of what could happen in Missouri," Chapel said.

source: «Люди должны быть так или иначе подготовлены, возьмут ли они с собой деньги для залога или сообщат родственникам, что путешествуют по территории штата».
translation: People should be prepared in one way or another, whether they take money for bail with them or inform their relatives that they are traveling within the state.
reference: People need to be ready, whether it's bringing bail money with them, or letting relatives know they are traveling through the state.

source: Согласно последним данным программы ФБР по сообщению о преступлениях на почве ненависти, в Миссури за 2015 год было зарегистрировано 100 преступлений на почве ненависти, что делает штат шестнадцатым в государстве по числу подобных нарушений.
translation: According to the latest data from the FBI's hate crime reporting program, there were 100 hate crimes reported in Missouri in 2015, which ranks the state sixteenth in the country in terms of the number of such violations.
reference: Missouri recorded 100 hate crimes in 2015, according to the latest figures from the FBI's hate crime reporting program, ranking the state at 16th in the country in terms of the number of such violations.

source: Также предупреждение по передвижению является ответом на новый закон штата Миссури, после принятия которого будет сложнее возбудить дело против юридического лица в связи с жилищной или трудовой дискриминацией.
translation: Moreover, a warning about movement is also a response to a new law in the state of Missouri, after the adoption of which it will be more difficult to bring a case against a legal entity in connection with housing or labor discrimination.
reference: The travel warning is also a response to a new Missouri law that would make it more difficult to sue a business for housing or employment discrimination.

source: Ранее Американский союз защиты гражданских свобод (ACLU) объявил предупреждения для путешествующих по Техасу и Аризоне после того, как эти штаты приняли новые законы иммиграционного контроля, согласно которым местным правоохранительным органам предписывалось арестовывать людей за нарушение иммиграционных законов, что, по мнению ACLU, должно было увеличить число проверок по расовому признаку.
translation: Previously, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) issued warnings to travelers in Texas and Arizona after these states adopted new immigration control laws, which instruct local law enforcement to arrest individuals for immigration law violations. According to the ACLU, this should increase the number of stops based on racial profiling.
reference: Previously, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) had issued travel advisories for Texas and Arizona after the states passed immigration enforcement laws requiring local law enforcement to detain people on immigration violations which the ACLU said would increase racial profiling.

source: Предупреждения по передвижению обычно выпускаются Государственным департаментом применительно к другим странам, но в последнее время общественные организации прибегли к этой мере в ответ на определённые законы и тенденции в пределах США.
translation: Warnings regarding movement are usually issued by the State Department with regard to other countries, but recently social organizations have resorted to this measure in response to certain laws and trends within the United States.
reference: Travel warnings are usually issued by the State Department for other countries, but lately, advocacy groups have resorted to the measure in response to certain laws and trends inside the US.

source: Два человека погибли в результате стрельбы по полицейскому патрулю в Египте
translation: Two people were killed as a result of shooting at a police patrol in Egypt.
reference: Two people have died as a result of a shooting of a police patrol in Egypt

source: Неизвестные обстреляли полицейский патруль в египетском городе Исна, сообщает Reuters со ссылкой на Министерство внутренних дел Египта.
translation: Unknown assailants fired on a police patrol in the Egyptian city of Aswan, Reuters reports, citing the Egyptian Ministry of Interior.
reference: The unidentified individuals shot at a police patrol in the Egyptian city of Esna, Reuters reports with reference to Egypt’s Ministry of Internal Affairs.

source: Во время перестрелки два человека, в том числе один полицейский, погибли, три человека получили ранения.
translation: During the shootout, two people, including one police officer, were killed, and three people were injured.
reference: Two people, including one police officer, were killed during the shooting, and three people suffered injuries.

source: Все раненые доставлены в больницу.
translation: All the wounded have been taken to the hospital.
reference: All the wounded were taken to hospital.

source: По данным агентства, полицейские остановили автомобиль, после чего два находящихся в машине вооруженных человека открыли по правоохранителям огонь.
translation: According to the agency, the police stopped a car, after which two armed individuals inside the vehicle opened fire on the law enforcement officers.
reference: According to the agency, the police officers stopped a vehicle, at which point the two armed individuals inside of the car opened fire on the law enforcement officials.

source: Один из злоумышленников задержан, второму удалось скрыться.
translation: One of the perpetrators has been detained, while the other managed to escape.
reference: One of the perpetrators has been apprehended, but the second managed to escape.

source: Ростуризм поддерживает закон об отмене бесплатного багажа для невозвратных авиабилетов
translation: Rus tourism supports the law on the cancellation of free baggage for one-way air tickets.
reference: The Russian Federal Tourism Agency supports the law eliminating the free baggage allowance for non-refundable airline tickets

source: Глава Ростуризма Олег Сафонов заявил в интервью телеканалу РБК, что "положительно" относится к принятию закона об отмене бесплатного провоза багажа при невозвратных авиабилетах.
translation: The head of Rostourism, Oleg Safonov, stated in an interview with the RBC television channel that he has a "positive" attitude towards the adoption of a law on the cancellation of free baggage allowance for non-refundable air tickets.
reference: The head of the Russian Federal Tourism Agency, Oleg Safonov, said in an interview with RBK television channel that he is “in favor” of adopting a law eliminating the free baggage allowance for non-refundable airline tickets.

source: "Нужно создавать условия, при которых человек, у которого нет багажа, может купить билет дешевле, нежели тот, у которого багаж есть", - подчеркнул он (цитата по ТАСС).
translation: "It is necessary to create conditions under which a person who does not have luggage can buy a ticket cheaper than one who has luggage," he emphasized (quote from TASS).
reference: “We need to establish conditions whereby a person who doesn’t have baggage can purchase a cheaper ticket than a person who has baggage”, he emphasized (quoted by TASS).

source: При этом господин Сафонов отметил, что, несмотря на опасения граждан, платить за провоз верхней одежды и мобильного телефона в ручной клади не придется.
translation: At the same time, Mr. Safonov noted that, despite citizens' concerns, they will not have to pay for carrying outerwear and a mobile phone in hand luggage.
reference: In addition to this, Mr. Safonov noted that, in spite of the concerns of citizens, there would be no need to pay for outerwear or mobile phones in carry-on baggage.

source: "Было бы правильно успокоить всех наших граждан и туристов и заявить об этом, сказать, что это к верхней одежде, к зонтику, к мобильному телефону, к айпэду или даже какому-то компьютеру отношения иметь не будет", - сказал глава Ростуризма.
translation: "It would be appropriate to reassure all of our citizens and tourists and declare that
reference: “It would be right to reassure all our citizens and tourists and to make an announcement about this, to say that this will have nothing to do with outerwear, umbrellas, mobile phones, iPads, or even some computers”, the head of the Russian Federal Tourism Agency said.

source: Ранее президент России Владимир Путин подписал закон, предусматривающий право авиакомпаний исключать норму о бесплатном провозе багажа при невозвратном авиабилете.
translation: Previously, Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law that allows airline companies to exclude the norm of free baggage allowance when it comes to non-refundable airline tickets.
reference: Earlier, Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law giving airline companies the right to eliminate the free baggage allowance rule on non-refundable airline tickets.

source: Речь идет о том, что авиакомпании могут сами определять количество мест и вес багажа, включенных в невозвратный тариф.
translation: The discussion is about the fact that airlines can determine the number of seats and the weight of luggage included in the non-refundable fare themselves.
reference: The point of the issue is that airline companies are free to determine the number of seats and weight of baggage at the non-refundable rate.

source: Владимир Путин поручил ликвидировать загрязнения Байкала
translation: Vladimir Putin has ordered to eliminate pollution in Baikal.
reference: Vladimir Putin has ordered the cleanup of pollution in Baikal

source: Президент России Владимир Путин на совещании по вопросам защиты Байкала сообщил, что за последние годы значительные территории озера подверглись экстремальному загрязнению.
translation: President of Russia Vladimir Putin at a meeting on issues of protecting Lake Baikal reported that significant territories of the lake have been subjected to extreme pollution in recent years.
reference: Russian President Vladimir Putin, at a meeting concerning the protection of Baikal, reported that, over the past several years, significant areas of the lake have been subjected to extreme contamination.

source: Он поручил определить источники финансирования, планы и исполнителей для ликвидации загрязнения.
translation: He entrusted to determine the sources of financing, plans, and performers for the elimination of pollution.
reference: He instructed that sources of financing, plans, and those responsible for implementing the cleanup of the pollution be identified.

source: Господин Путин также поручил провести полноценную рекультивацию загрязненных территорий.
translation: Mr. Putin also instructed to conduct full-scale rehabilitation of polluted territories.
reference: Mr. Putin also ordered that a full-fledged reclamation of polluted areas be conducted.

source: "Необходимо разобраться и с объектами, продолжающими здесь работать, очистные сооружения большинства из них изношены", - цитирует "РИА Новости" президента.
translation: "It is necessary to understand and deal with the objects that continue to operate here, the sewage facilities of most of them are worn out," - quotes RIA Novosti the president.
reference: “It is also necessary to deal with the facilities that continue to operate here; the sewage treatment plants, the majority of them are worn-out”, RIA Novosti quotes the president as saying.

source: Он также добавил, что Генеральная прокуратура России должна провести проверку по выявлению экологически вредной деятельности.
translation: He also added that the General Prosecutor's Office of Russia should conduct an audit to detect environmentally harmful activities.
reference: He also added that the Office of the Prosecutor General of the Russian Federation should conduct an inquiry to identify environmentally destructive activities.

source: По его словам, в районе озера существуют проблемы, связанные с появлением стихийных свалок и рядом нарушений в сфере экологии со стороны организаторов отдыха.
translation: According to him, there are problems in the lake area related to the appearance of spontaneous dumps and a number of ecological violations by recreation organizers.
reference: According to him, there are problems connected to illegal dumping and a range of environmental violations by recreation operators in the area around the lake.

source: "Я хочу это подчеркнуть: не все подряд проверять, здесь тоже меру нужно знать, но именно - незаконной и экологически вредной деятельности и принять соответствующие меры", - подчеркнул он.
translation: I would like to emphasize: not everything should be checked indiscriminately, there also needs to be a measure here, but specifically - illegal and environmentally harmful activities should be addressed with appropriate measures, - he emphasized.
reference: “I would like to emphasize this: there’s no need to inspect everything in sight – we also need to know where to draw the line – but specifically illegal and environmentally destructive activities and then take appropriate measures”, he stressed.

source: Ранее Генпрокуратура сообщила о сокращении запасов рыбы в озере Байкал и предложила увеличить число объектов, подпадающих под экологический надзор.
translation: Previously, the Prosecutor General's Office reported a decrease in the fish stock in Lake Baikal and suggested increasing the number of objects falling under environmental oversight.
reference: Earlier, the Prosecutor General’s Office reported a reduction of fish stocks in Lake Baikal and proposed increasing the number of facilities subject to environmental supervision.

source: Напомним, 15 июня Владимир Путин в ходе прямой линии заявил о необходимости изменения законодательства для обеспечения прав граждан, живущих на природных территориях особого режима охраны.
translation: Let us remind you, on June 15, Vladimir Putin, during a live line, announced the need to change the legislation in order to ensure the rights of citizens living in natural territories of special protection regime.
reference: You will recall that on June 15, during the direct line, Vladimir Putin spoke about the necessity of changing legislation to ensure the protection of the rights of citizens living in natural areas under the special protection regime.

source: О проблемах с ведением хозяйственной деятельности ему сообщили жители острова Ольхон, который входит в Байкальскую природную территорию.
translation: The residents of Olkhon Island, which is part of the Baikal Natural Territory, informed him about the problems with conducting business activities.
reference: Residents of Olkhon Island, which is part of the Baikal Natural Territory, let him know about problems with conducting business activities.

source: Глава Минприроды Сергей Донской сразу же предложил решить проблему путем уточнения границ водоохранной зоны Байкала, но в правительстве Бурятии напомнили, что такого изменения недостаточно, поскольку ограничения связаны с целым рядом нормативных актов.
translation: Minister of Natural Resources, Sergey Donskoy, immediately proposed to solve the problem by clarifying the boundaries of Lake Baikal's water protection zone, but reminding in the government of Buryatia that such a change is not enough, since the restrictions are associated with a whole range of regulatory legal acts.
reference: The head of the Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment, Sergei Donskoi, immediately offered to solve the problem by amending the borders of Lake Baikal’s water protection zone, but the Government of Buryatia reminded that such a change would be insufficient given that the restrictions are tied to a whole range of regulatory acts.

source: Ранее в Минэкономики предлагали решить проблему путем изменения Земельного кодекса и закона об охране окружающей среды.
translation: Previously, in the Ministry of Economic Development, it was proposed to solve the problem through amendments to the Land Code and the law on the protection of the environment.
reference: Previously, the Ministry of Economic Development proposed solving the problem by amending the land code and the law on environmental protection.

source: В Югре появится новый храм
translation: A new temple will appear in Yugra.
reference: There will be a new church in Yurga

source: В поселке Сосьва члены общины из представителей коренных малочисленных народов Севера "Рахтынья", вместе с жителями Березовского района принимают участие в строительстве православного храма в честь святителя Николая Чудотворца.
translation: In the settlement of Solvyanka, members of the community of indigenous peoples of the North "Rakhtinya," along with residents of the Berezovsky district, are participating in the construction of an Orthodox church in honor of Saint Nicholas the Wonderworker.
reference: In the village of Sosva, members of the Rakhtynya community of indigenous peoples of the North, along with residents of Berezovsky District, will take part in the construction of an orthodox church in honor of Saint Nicholas the Wonderworker.

source: Его месторасположения - речной берег, храм будет хорошо виден издалека, поэтому он послужит для рыбаков путевым маяком.
translation: Its location is a river bank. The temple will be visible from a distance, so it will serve as a landmark for fishermen.
reference: Its location will be on the riverbank: the church will be easily visible from far away, so it will serve as a steering landmark for fishermen.

source: По словам представителей общины, работы по строительству завершатся уже в этом году, сейчас установлены купола, имеются в наличии церковные колокола.
translation: According to community representatives, construction work will be completed this year already, domes have been installed and there are already church bells.
reference: According to members of the community, construction work will already be completed this year: so far the dome has been installed, and the church bell is on hand.

source: Игримская РЭБ флота оказала транспортное сопровождение.
translation:
The Igrimsky REB (Radio Electronic Battalion) of the Navy provided transport escort.

Note: The term "REB" is an abbreviation for "Radio Electronic Battalion," which is a unit in the Russian Navy responsible for electronic warfare and radio intelligence. The term "флота" means "of the Navy." The word "оказала" means "provided." The phrase "транспортное сопровождение" means "transport escort."
reference: The Igrimsk Fleet Repair and Operational Base provided transport services.

source: Храм назван в честь святого Николая Чудотворца, поскольку он почитается православной церковью как покровитель путников, в том числе и рыбаков.
translation: The church is named after Saint Nicholas the Wonderworker because he is revered by the Orthodox Church as the protector of travelers, including sailors.
reference: The church was named in honor of Saint Nicholas the Wonderworker, since the Orthodox Church venerates him as the patron of travellers, including fishermen.

source: В Сосьве же рыбный промысел дает поселенцам работу, кормит их.
translation: In Solsv (Sosva), fishing provides work for the settlers and feeds them.
reference: After all, in Sosva, the fishing industry provides settlers with work and feeds them.

source: Местные жители ждут, когда храм откроет свои двери, а дети даже пишут в школьных сочинениях о нем как о местной достопримечательности.
translation: Local residents are waiting for the church to open its doors, while children even write about it in their school essays as a local landmark.
reference: Local residents are waiting for the day the church opens its doors, and children are even writing school compositions about it as a local attraction.

source: Диснейленд со смертной казнью.
translation:
Disneyland with the death penalty.

(Note: This is a literal translation of the Russian text. The sentence is grammatically correct in English, but it may sound unusual or confusing because Disneyland is typically associated with fun and entertainment, not with the death penalty.)
reference: Disneyland with the death penalty.

source: Почему в Сингапуре соблюдают законы?
translation: Why are laws obeyed in Singapore?
reference: Why are laws obeyed in Singapore?

source: Я разговариваю с местным бизнесменом Чангом, сидя в закусочной на открытом воздухе.
translation: I am speaking with a local businessman named Chang, sitting in an open-air cafeteria.
reference: I am talking with a local businessman, Chang, while sitting in an open-air eatery.

source: Комментируя ситуацию в Сингапуре, Чанг курит одну сигарету за другой, окурки же аккуратно складирует в прихваченную с собой из офиса железную коробочку.
translation: Commenting on the situation in Singapore, Chang smokes one cigarette after another, carefully stowing the butts in a metal box he brought from the office.
reference: Commenting on the situation in Singapore, Chang smokes one cigarette after another, while carefully placing the butts into a small iron box he brought with him from the office.

source: После окончания беседы бизнесмен направляется к ближайшей урне - до нее метров сто - и выбрасывает туда бычки.
translation: After finishing the conversation, the businessman heads towards the nearest trash can, which is about a hundred meters away, and throws away his cigarette butts.
reference: After finishing our conversation, the businessman heads toward the nearest trashcan (it’s about 100 meters away) and dumps the butts into it.

source: Штраф за мусор в общественном месте - 500 местных долл., - сообщает Чанг.
translation: Fine for litter in a public place - 500 local dollars, reports Chang.
reference: The fine for littering in public places is 500 local dollars, Chang says.

source: Знаете, у меня с детства просто рефлекс выработался: нельзя бросить фантик от конфеты на мостовую, моментально оштрафуют.
translation: You know, I have had a reflex since childhood: you cannot throw a candy wrapper on the sidewalk, you will be fined immediately.
reference: You know, it’s a simple reflex I developed in my childhood: it’s forbidden to throw a candy wrapper onto the pavement; they will fine you instantly.

source: А сейчас вообще всюду видеокамеры.
translation: Now there are video cameras everywhere.
reference: Nowadays, the fact is, there are cameras everywhere.

source: И действительно - тротуары Сингапура в центре города чисты, словно в музее.
translation: Indeed, the sidewalks of Singapore in the city center are clean, as if in a museum.
reference: And it’s true: the sidewalks in downtown Singapore are clean, as if in a museum.

source: Чанг рассказывает: три месяца назад 18-летний сын его соседа изрисовал граффити стену старого колониального здания.
translation:
Chang relates: three months ago, the 18-year-old son of his neighbor decorated a graffiti on the wall of an old colonial building.

Note: I made an assumption that Чанг (Chang) is a name of a person telling the story, and соседа (soseda) means "neighbor" in this context. Also, the word изрисовал (izrisoval) was translated as "decorated a graffiti" which means to create or draw a graffiti.
reference: Chang says that, three months ago, his neighbor’s 18-year-old son wrote graffiti on the wall of an old colonial building.

source: Суд признал парня виновным в вандализме и приговорил к порке.
translation:
The court found the boy guilty of vandalism and sentenced him to be whipped.

Note: The punishment of whipping is no longer used in modern legal systems in English-speaking countries. A more appropriate translation of the punishment might be "community service" or "fine," depending on the context.
reference: The court found the boy guilty of vandalism and he was sentenced to flogging.

source: Чего?!
translation: "What?!" or "What did you say?!" This exclamation can be used to express surprise, shock, disbelief, or to ask for clarification. The tone of voice and context in which it is used can greatly affect its meaning.
reference: What?!

source: Представьте себе.
translation: "Imagine yourself that you are on a deserted island."
reference: Just imagine.

source: Он получил десять ударов деревянной палкой по ягодицам и провел неделю в тюрьме.
translation: He received ten strikes with a wooden stick on his buttocks and spent a week in prison.
reference: He received ten lashings with a wooden cane to his buttocks and spent a week in jail.

source: У нас вообще телесные наказания не редкость.
translation:
We don't rarely have physical punishments.

A more natural way to translate this sentence into English would be:

"We often have physical punishments here."
reference: Here, in general, corporal punishment is not uncommon.

source: Как в Сингапуре сочетаются высочайший уровень жизни и неимоверно суровые законы, разбирался на месте обозреватель "АиФ".
translation: A correspondent for "Argumenty i Fakty" examined firsthand how high living standards and incredibly harsh laws coexist in Singapore.
reference: AiF’s staff writer understood, right then and there, how exceptionally high living standards and unbelievably harsh laws go together in Singapore.

source: Здесь никто не думает отменять смертную казнь, - объясняет адвокат Виктор Ли Хонг.
translation: "Nobody here is thinking about abolishing the death penalty," explains attorney Victor Li Hong.
reference: Here, no one is concerned with abolishing the death penalty, explains lawyer Victor Lee Hong.

source: И правительству давно плевать на мнение как Евросоюза, так и США по этому поводу.
translation: And the government has long stopped caring about the opinion of both the European Union and the USA on this matter.
reference: And the government stopped caring a long time ago about the opinion of both the European Union and the United States on this matter.

source: Если человек провозит большую партию наркотиков или торгует ими - ему положена виселица.
translation:
If a person transports a large party of narcotics or deals in them - the punishment is the death penalty.

Note: The death penalty is currently not a punishment for any crime in Russia. This is a holdover from the Soviet era and is not reflective of current Russian law.
reference: If a person smuggles in a large shipment of drugs or sells them, then they are sent to the gallows.

source: В 2002 г. в аэропорту Чанги задержали 22-летнего гражданина Австралии: он вез с собой 400 г кокаина.
translation: In 2002, a 22-year-old Australian citizen was detained at Changi Airport: he was carrying 400 grams of cocaine.
reference: In 2002, a 22-year-old Australian citizen was detained at Changi airport: he was carrying 400 g of cocaine on him.

source: В его защиту выступили австралийский премьер, угрожая санкциями, международные правозащитники и даже папа Римский.
translation: His defense was made by the Australian prime minister, threatening with sanctions, international human rights activists, and even the Pope.
reference: The Australian prime minister (threatening sanctions), international human rights advocates, and even the Pope came to his defense.

source: Однако парня в итоге все равно повесили.
translation:
However, they still ended up hanging the guy.

The Russian sentence "Однако парня в итоге все равно повесили" can be translated to English as "However, they still ended up hanging the guy." The word "парня" is the accusative singular form of "парень" which means "guy" or "boy". The verb "повесили" is the past tense of "повесить" which means "to hang" (in the sense of executing someone). The word "в итоге" means "in the end" or "ultimately". The word "все равно" means "all the same" or "still". So the sentence can be interpreted as "However, they still ended up hanging the guy in the end."
reference: Nevertheless, the boy still ended up being hanged.

source: После этого наркокурьеры нашу страну старательно объезжают стороной.
translation: After that, drug couriers carefully go around our country.
reference: Since then, drug traffickers carefully bypass our country.

source: Дело в следующем: в Сингапуре положено, что законы обязаны соблюдать ВСЕ подряд, а не только скромные и небогатые люди.
translation: The point is that in Singapore, it is required that laws are to be followed by ALL, not just the humble and poor.
reference: Here’s the deal: in Singapore, the rule is that absolutely EVERYONE must obey the laws, not just simple people and those of modest means.

source: Неважно, кто ты - миллионер, вице-премьер, известный артист или житель Евросоюза.
translation: It doesn't matter who you are - a millionaire, vice-premier, famous artist or a resident of the European Union.
reference: It doesn’t matter who you are: a millionaire, the vice prime minister, a famous actor, or a resident of the European Union.
